7. File Parsing

Subpages

  1. 7.1. CSV
  2. 7.2. VCalendar
  3. 7.3. vCard

Introduction

CMFileParser provides an interface for classes to normalise the operating of reading files, in a similar way that CMDatabaseProtocol uses a standard set of functions that connect to different backend databases.

As there are so many different file types that are handled in a variety of ways not all classes will implement all the methods from the CMFileParser interface. You will need to check the documentation for the classes specific to the type of file you are reading/writing.

Multirecord Files

Some file types contain a single entity (like an image) and some files contain zero or more entities like a vCard file.
